title: Cap Haitien Rum & Honey Recipe
full_text:
Cap Haitien Rum & Honey Recipe
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2 1/2
ounces
Barbancourt 15-year-old rum
(or mix Barbancourt white with an aged rum such as Bacardi 8)
1 to 2
teaspoons
honey
, to taste (the drink will mix easier if the honey is diluted with an equal amount of hot water)
2
dashes
Angostura bitters
(optional)
Directions
Pour diluted honey to an old fashioned glass and add rum and bitters, if desired; stir to combine. Fill glass with ice and stir until chilled.
Rum
